name: ListGithubIssueComments
description:
Retrieve comments for a specific GitHub issue.

Use this tool to get all comments for a specific issue in a GitHub repository. It’s useful when you need to review discussions or updates on a particular issue.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. Provide the username as a case-insensitive string.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository (case insensitive).

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the GitHub issue to retrieve comments for.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: since_timestamp
parameters.description: Show notifications updated after this time in ISO 8601 format (`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`).

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of comments to retrieve per page, maximum 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of results to fetch when listing comments for pagination purposes.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
